interface.name: inn_exec
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to execute innd in the caller domain.

interface.name: inn_exec_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to execute inn configuration files in /etc.

interface.name: inn_manage_log
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the innd log.

interface.name: inn_manage_pid
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the innd pid files.

interface.name: inn_dgram_send
interface.summary: Send to a innd unix dgram socket.

interface.name: inn_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute inn in the inn domain.
